system.description:
You and your gear turn into a treant with the below stats for the spell's duration.

You do not have the treant's Animate Tree talent.

You cannot cast spells while under the effect of this spell.

You retain your INT, WIS, and CHA stats.

AC 14, HP 38, ATK 2 slam +8 (1d12) or 1 rock (far) +8 (2d6), MV near, S +4, D -1, C +2, I *, W *, Ch *, AL N, LV 8

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark.spell-effects.Item.rgfyqmZvgYX1PWqw]{Spell Effect: Treeshape}
